1455610.name: Little Martian
1455610.description:
Little Martian is a survival game, full of exploration, resource-gathering, base-building, and farming. You've crash-landed on an unexplored planet, with only your trusty robot and animal sidekicks by your side!

With your spaceship laying in ruins, you must venture out into the unknown, to find the parts needed to repair it and return home. Along the way you'll discover abandoned buildings, hinting at the plight of the former inhabitants!



  • Explore the wilderness, encountering strange and unusual biomes.
  • Craft hundreds of items and tools.
  • Build yourself a base, to provide oxygen and a place to sleep.
  • Bond with your sidekick, as they keep you company.
  • Search for new parts to repair your damaged spaceship.
  • Discover abandoned structures, hinting at past inhabitants.
  • Farm crops, including tomatoes, chilli peppers, and wheat.
  • Experiment with ingredients, and cook over 50 different dishes.
